a thick, Mexican soup made with pork (= meat from a pig), hominy (= a food made from dried corn), garlic, and spices: To make the posole: first, rinse and drain the hominy. The restaurant resembles a typical Mexican taqueria, selling pozole and beef tongue tacos.
More examplesFewer examplesFor our posole, we used tinned hominy, but you can also buy it dried.Posole is hominy stew made with dried corn, combined with pork and seasonings.The pozole was great; it was full of hominy with a delicious broth, which was definitely homemade.
